poker.deck

Class Deck

  • java.lang.Object
    • poker.deck.Deck

  • public class Deck
extends java.lang.Object
    A standard 52-card deck.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.List<Card> cards
      a list containing the cards in the deck

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Deck() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Card dealCard()
      Returns a card from the top of the deck.
      private void initDeck()
      Clears the deck and adds all cards in suit and rank order.
      boolean remove(Card c)
      Removes the specified card from the deck.
      void reset()
      Puts back all cards to the deck and orders them by suit and rank.
      void shuffle()
      Shuffles the cards in the deck.
      int size()
      Returns the number of cards in the deck.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • size

        public int size()
        Returns the number of cards in the deck.
        Returns:
        the number of cards in the deck

      • dealCard

        public Card dealCard()
        Returns a card from the top of the deck.
        Returns:
        a card from the top of the deck.

      • remove

        public boolean remove(Card c)
        Removes the specified card from the deck.
        Parameters:
        c - the card to be removed
        Returns:
        true if the card was removed, false if the deck did not contain the specified card

      • shuffle

        public void shuffle()
        Shuffles the cards in the deck.

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Puts back all cards to the deck and orders them by suit and rank.

      • initDeck

        private void initDeck()
        Clears the deck and adds all cards in suit and rank order. The suits are ordered from spades to clubs and the ranks from ace to deuce.
